verses.roman:
maghavāṁs tam abhipretya
baleḥ paramam udyamam
sarva-deva-gaṇopeto
gurum etad uvāca ha

synonyms: maghavān—Indra; tam—the situation; abhipretya—understanding; baleḥ—of Bali Mahārāja; paramam udyamam—great enthusiasm; sarva-deva-gaṇa—by all the demigods; upetaḥ—accompanied; gurum—unto the spiritual master; etat—the following words; uvāca—said; ha—indeed.
translation: Seeing Bali Mahārāja's indefatigable endeavor and understanding his motive, King Indra, along with the other demigods, approached his spiritual master, Bṛhaspati, and spoke as follows.
